author: felicity
msg: bug 3270: have spamassassin and spamd check to make sure they're the same version as the modules that they load.  this will avoid an issue which has come up where people have, for instance, the 'spamassassin' script from 2.31 running with modules from 2.63, and then complaining there are issues.
